verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Silvanus|strong="G4610"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w*, unto the \w church|strong="G1577"\w* of the \w Thessalonians|strong="G2331"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

We are \w bound|strong="G3784"\w* to \w thank|strong="G2168"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w meet|strong="G0514"\w*, because \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* groweth \w exceedingly|strong="G5232"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w charity|strong="G0026"\w* of \w every|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w toward|strong="G1519"\w* each \w other|strong="G0240"\w* \w aboundeth|strong="G4121"\w*;

So \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w ourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G2744"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w churches|strong="G1577"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w persecutions|strong="G1375"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w tribulations|strong="G2347"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* ye \w endure|strong="G0430"\w*:

\add Which is\add* a manifest \w token|strong="G1730"\w* of the \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \w judgment|strong="G2920"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G1519"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* may be counted \w worthy|strong="G2661"\w* of the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G3958"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w*:

\w Seeing|strong="G1512"\w* \add it is\add* a righteous \w thing|strong="G1342"\w* \w with|strong="G3844"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* to \w recompense|strong="G0467"\w* \w tribulation|strong="G2347"\w* to them that \w trouble|strong="G2346"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* who are \w troubled|strong="G2346"\w* \w rest|strong="G0425"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w when|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* shall be \w revealed|strong="G0602"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mighty|strong="G1411"\w* \w angels|strong="G0032"\w*,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w flaming|strong="G5395"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w taking|strong="G1325"\w* \w vengeance|strong="G1557"\w* on them that \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3748"\w* shall be \w punished|strong="G5099"\w* with \w everlasting|strong="G0166"\w* \w destruction|strong="G3639"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w presence|strong="G4383"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w power|strong="G2479"\w*;

\w When|strong="G3752"\w* he shall \w come|strong="G2064"\w* to be \w glorified|strong="G1740"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to be \w admired|strong="G2296"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* them that \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* (\w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w testimony|strong="G3142"\w* \w among|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* was \w believed|strong="G4100"\w*) \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1519"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* we \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* would \w count|strong="G0515"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0515"\w* \w of|strong="G2821"\w* \add this\add* \w calling|strong="G2821"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fulfil|strong="G4137"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the good \w pleasure|strong="G2107"\w* \w of|strong="G0019"\w* \add his\add* \w goodness|strong="G0019"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w work|strong="G2041"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*:

\w That|strong="G3704"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* may be \w glorified|strong="G1740"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.
